content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We consider taking responsibility and being accountable for the work we do is key to bring valuable results to our clients. During our everyday work in the distributed environments, we value professionalism, honesty, transparency and willingness to go the extra mile to make things done. We partnership on development with the client, where communication is a key aspect in our work delivering first-class engineering services.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/69542d8b-5793-407c-96b7-6342b47f42bc/image2020-3-31_13-41-31.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":732,\"height\":306}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
